website_summaries.verdict: A large, stylish toiletry bag that can be used by either a man or a woman.
pros: Synthetic PU leather with waterproof lining offers durability and protection
Very roomy, with the ability to store a variety of items
cons: The bag is made of synthetic leather instead of real leather
Does not hang like the other bags listed here

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, This is the Bag you want
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Extremely functional and versatile and fits more than enough than what I need / use it for. I was a bit cautious to order because of the color the pics made the leather look. But it doesn't look as orange in real life. If you're looking for a travel / toiletry bag I highly recommend this one A+++ quality and class
customer_reviews.author: ALKA

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toiletry bag, I got it for my boyfriend due to some traveling we were planning on doing and it was perfect. The bottom compartment is really useful if you want to separate your supplies. The top compartment is also lined with a material that can easily be wiped down incase you have any spills. The only thing I would like to see improvement on in this bag is the zipper, it gets a little tough to use but that is because the bag is so sturdy it has a thicker zipper. Highly recommended. Definitely a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian P.

customer_reviews.title: The Veteilli Leather Toiletry Bag has issues
customer_reviews.text: ***Updated: remain zipper pulls have fallen off with only normal travel use. Now a complete hassle to use. Should have lasted longer than 6 months. The Veteilli Leather Toiletry Bag is a nice looking product. Unfortunately, two of the four zipper pulls have broken off with very little wear and tear. I would consider looking at other options and will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: DDpdx

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! The color isn't the rich brown/red as shown, it's a dull, dry dirt brown. It feels like cheap vinyl, plus I was unable to find any verification stating it was made of genuine leather. It was also crushed in the bag, which was in the box it was shipped in (which was not damaged at all). I'd have given it no stars but that wasn't an option.
customer_reviews.author: Madlynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I chose this dopp bag! It arrived promptly, was packaged beautifully, and serves its purpose very well. The bag has ample space for toiletry items, and I really like that the top portion is lined just in case of messes. I bought this for a gift and it was very well received. Also, customer service is excellent. I didn't have any need to contact the company, but its representatives still reached out to make sure that everything was going smoothly. Highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Product is not real leather, it is "vegan leather" and it is prone to tooth paste stains
customer_reviews.text: This item is incorrectly marketed as a leather toiletry bag, it is in fact "vegan leather" i.e. fake leather... The design means well but fails to deliver, the way it is designed is not very functional. However, my biggest gripe with the product is its propensity to stain. Another advertising half truth - the product is "easy to clean"; cleaning the product as directed does not remove even simple tooth paste stains.
customer_reviews.author: SanAntonio0901

customer_reviews.title: Not Leather as described.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on its description noting that it was “leather.” I had never even heard of “Vegan leather” or “PU leather.” I’ve heard of “Pleather” and Patent Leather all indicating a fabricated material that is NOT leather. Leather has a definition— a material made from the skin of an animal. I was looking for a product that would last years, as has been my experience with leather, for a gift for my husband who travels. When we received this and saw the description of “Vegan Leather” and PU Leather which we’re not featured in the product description, we were both greatly disappointed. I returned this immediately and bought a leather product.
customer_reviews.author: ClixyMcQuickshopper

customer_reviews.title: Men Leather Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: This item came rather quickly. I ordered on friday and gotin on Sunday morning. Its lightwight, the color is as advertised, the packaging was secure. I though it would come in a better casing but thats alright. I was expecting a thicker leather but it makes sense to be lightwight since its for traveling purposes. I adore the shade of brown and the style is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. George

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend, since he goes to the gym everyday I figured it would be nice to have something to put his toiletries in instead of just throwing them in his gym bag. He absolutely loved it, it has so much space for everything he uses and he also took it on a trip we went on and got compliments about how nice it looked. The quality was great in my opinion. The compartments at the bottom are a plus, I had looked at different ones an didn't find anything with the compartments as spacious as this bag. I would definitely recommend you consider purchasing this bag I don't think you will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Okay bag, NOT real leather.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is okay with a good design and works as expected. I gave this two stars because I feel intentionally mislead by the seller. Everywhere in the title and only two places in the long description it says leather, only the word leather. Upon receiving this bag I immediately knew it was not genuine leather. Reading through the description I found two places, one time on an image sub header, that tells you it is not really leather. One place it says cruelty free, again misleading, then ONE place where it says leather (PU). Disappointed because I wanted a genuine leather bag because it lay and will always look nice. This bag won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: GKB

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking shaving bag
customer_reviews.text: At the time of purchase, very nice looking shaving bag...after being handled, bag looks horrible. Bag is very durable and accommodated all items. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. It is leather shavings compressed and cheaply died. As soon as it touches any water the color runs all over and stains whatever its touching.
customer_reviews.author: Sir William of Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it! BUY IT NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about this bag! Real genuine leather! High quality! Durable! Looks and feels extremely expensive! Fits perfect in luggage. Beautiful design! Great zippers! Look no further this bag is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not leather!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT LEATHER! it is a cheap looking plastic and the zipper is rough and catches. Very expensive for a cheap piece of crap made in China.
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: Great Toiletry Bag (Dopp Kit)
customer_reviews.text: This toiletry bag is great. The "leather" looks real and the size is perfect for carrying all you need on a trip. I bought this for my son who loves it, especially the plastic-lined interior to protect the bag from spills, the travel bottles that are the perfect size for shampoo and other toiletries and the bottom compartment that is big enough to carry a hair brush. He's used it for two trips so far and says he doesn't know what he ever did without it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Fancy Pants

customer_reviews.title: Vetelli (NOT) Leather Toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it claimed to be leather. I knew as soon as I received, it is NOT leather. WAY down in description it says liner is leather? That is debatable as well. I'm curious to know how this company can claim bag is leather when it isn't. I do like the separate zipper compartment on the bottom of the bag. If you don't care for leather travel bags, this bag would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Vetilli Toiletry Bag, what a buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the Vetilli Leather Toiletry bag for men I thought it was kinda small for what I paid. Then I realized that it was compressed for shipping purposes. So as I took it out of the bag and expanded it I said "WOW". It has a lot of room and two containers for things like shampoo and such. It is very well crafted and all of the construction that goes into the bag is of the highest quality. I am very pleased with my purchase. I had another toiletry bag, but it wasn't sufficient for my trip. I like the Vetilli Bag is one of those purchases you won't regret.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Davis

customer_reviews.title: I think there are better products on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this toiletry bag for a year now. It's bulky and heavy. I put it at the bottom of my suitcase so the weight is distributed. It's ok. The leather, when it gets wet, looks like crap. I'm torn about it because it does store a lot of toiletry items, but I don't think I would buy this item again for a gift or for my personal use.
customer_reviews.author: MovieFan

customer_reviews.title: Came in a nice bag so it wouldn't get damaged
customer_reviews.text: Bag came in quick. Came in a nice bag so it wouldn't get damaged, and it's actually something you can use when packing as to not damage the leather or get it dirty. The quality seems very very good. The bottom section is great to put liquids or anything that can possibly melt. The larger part above has a nice thick plastic liner on the bottom so if anything were to spill, it will help protect the bag and outer leather. overall, very nice product. Giving away as a groomsmen gift to guys who travel for work a lot- and I'm sure they'll appreciate a fine quality and manly toiletry bag!

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a new shaving kit, a bag to carry around my razor and supplies for overnight trips... Instead, my razor and things have found a permanent home in the bag, displayed on a shelf in the bathroom, because it's just too nice to hide away. The leather is extremely good quality, the zippers are chunky and smooth and easy, the stitching careful and exact. It's hard to explain what makes a bag nice, but I have a unique experience in that I sold luggage and leather goods for about a decade. This is a nice bag. It would have been a good purchase at twice what I paid, or even three times.
customer_reviews.author: Josephus Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very spacious.
customer_reviews.text: Had to think for a long time before buying this but I have no regrets. It's very spacious and perfect for long term travel. The leather is good quality. The zippers are good. It has plastic inside liner in case your containers rip or break and spill all over the insides. Definitely happy with this product and I would say I'm a very picky shoppers. If I had to pick one negative I'd say it's a bit too big. I have a small weekender bad and this case takes up too much space. Take away half an inch from the length and width of the base and it would be perfect. Still, pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: RadRussian

customer_reviews.title: High quality bag-perfect gift for men
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for a friend of mine and he loved it. The quality is better than what you would expect for the price, as well as the size. All the compartments are very well placed and very roomy. It has interior plastic lining in case of spilage. The two travel size bottles that come with the bag are of better quality than expected, and flexible. NOTE: The one I received was just slightly lighter in color than the one in the picture. Highly reccomend this product. Great gift for men.
customer_reviews.author: Yarko Vanko

customer_reviews.title: Vitelli Leather Toiletry Bag is Everything It Says It is!
customer_reviews.text: The Vitelli Leather Toiletry Bag For Men was purchased as a gift for my son-in-law. It is a nice quality item with roomy compartments and two nicely sized plastic bottles to carry shampoo and the like.. When it arrived, the two travel bottles were missing. This company's customer service is beyond excellent. They made sure that I received the bottles right away, and followed up several times with me to ensure my satisfaction. My son-in-law loves his new toiletry bag. It is a fine gift for any gentleman!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzyjo57

customer_reviews.title: I had heard of the fine reputation of the Vetelli product line
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of the fine reputation of the Vetelli product line, however this was my first purchase. I am completely satisfied. Since this is for my personal use you can expect to hear from me again in the very near future. Sincerely, Larry
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Yellow Cloth Tool Bag
customer_reviews.text: Looking for something elegant and functional and I have found it in this Vetelli toiletry bag. I am in the process of preparing to take it cross country. I am impressed with how much I can get in it and the protection it offers in both top and bottom compartments. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: China Beach Marine

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bag. On the top part you can’t see it in the picture but it is clear plastic lined inside. This saved my bag from being ruined! My pre shave oil leaked a little into the bag somehow and this added bonus to the bag saved it from soaking into the leather. (Not that I would have minded my bag smelling like sandalwood) the bottom compartment is very nice as well. This is a solid buy as long as th zippers hold up, which I think they should. If they break I will update this post.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley H

customer_reviews.title: After 30+ years. my husband had to replace his dopp kit. He gives this one 10 stars.
customer_reviews.text: My husband had the same dopp kit well before 1990. It is worn out & has a zipper issue now. After numerous years, he decided to search for one. When this dopp kit arrived, he inspected it inside & out. He is very, very pleased with his new dopp kit. It holds a lot!!!
customer_reviews.author: swsurfside

customer_reviews.title: Awesome storage for all of your manly needs.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome storage for all of your manly needs. High quality construction with thick leather, sturdy zippers and a bit larger than what I expected even. Still fits in the bottom of a carry-on though. Comes with two 3 ounce liquid squeeze containers that are high quality as well. I didn't think I'd use them but they ended up being good for mouthwash and shampoo(so you don't smell like the girly stuff in the hotel).
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever Toiletry Bag I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: The Vetelli Toiletry Bag is my perfect bag. The bottom unzips so that I can keep my shaving equipment separate from the rest of my travel gear. A thick plastic liner enables me to eliminate packing liquids in plastic bags. Both zippers work smoothly. Especially great is the upscale look of fine leather. I love this bag and I ordered a second bag for long trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t if I were You
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Even worse than the prior version which is advertised as the same as before. I reordered it because I liked the way that the storage was arranged, but after the zippers broke, it was time to order a new one. The one that arrived was basically some Chinese plastic POS version of my old one which was a leather blend with cheap zippers ( same as 1st version ), but even cheaper material. :(
customer_reviews.author: Todd Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Fine Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toiletry bag. Quality craftsmanship as far as I can tell, only had it a couple months now but it has the feel of a well made product. It looks great and has plenty of room for everything a gentleman would need for traveling. Bonus, you don't actually need to be a gentlemen, they don't even check.
customer_reviews.author: Mylez

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bag.  Even nicer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my husband who's previous bag was made of nylon. He loves the quality of the bag and it's structure. There are two compartments in the bag. The bottom compartment is the perfect size for small liquid items like shampoo. The other compartment is more open for bigger things like a razor, brush, toothbrush, etc. The bag fits easily in a suitcase. The leather has been conditioned with some water repellant and looks like it will age beautifully. Overall this is a really nice bag and I would buy it again especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: skilian

customer_reviews.title: Be organized when travelling
customer_reviews.text: My husband travels a lot, and was previously throwing his toiletries in his suitcase pocket. This item keeps everything together and organized. The leather is soft, and of good quality. I love the 2 compartments - so you can separate the electronic devices from the liquids. I may go back and purchase another one for my Dad.
customer_reviews.author: therovingeye

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a Very durable  toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, husband loved it. Arrived on time and it looks just as described. It has many pockets and storage places and it looks very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RomiNation

customer_reviews.title: Cheap feeling, nice configuration, spend more get more.
customer_reviews.text: feels cheap. At this price point or a little better you can get real leather, I do like the configuration with the lower compartment, but that doesn't justify the price or cheapness.
customer_reviews.author: Drue J. Deshotels

customer_reviews.title: Anyone looking at this perfect travel bag would think it costs a fortune
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so deceiving when you first look at it in terms of the amount of items it holds. There are multiple compartments, including ones protected by plastic lining. Anyone looking at this perfect travel bag would think it costs a fortune. Beautiful leather, engraved with Vetelli, but it is actually quite reasonable in price. My son got it for my husband as a Christmas gift and he is thrilled. Exactly what he wanted. I highly recommend this product and will be back to this company for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anders

customer_reviews.title: This is the toiletry bag to get!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a nice quality leather toiletry bag, like my Dad has. This fits the bill, and exceeds my expectations. It is made from beautiful leather, and it has held up well over the last year. However, I can see this lasting many more years to come. I love the fact that it comes with bottles for you to fill with your own shampoo/body wash. It's a nice size, and shape. Fits nicely into our luggage bags. The color is gorgeous as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Apel

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes imitation leather actually feels like real leather. Not this one! Feels like imitation. This is a good looking bag but that's about all it has going for it. There's a tiny zipped pocket in the large compartment but no elastic straps to keep things in place just a large cavernous space. The bottom compartment is decent with straps and pockets to keep your items organized. The bottomline is that this bag is overpriced unless you think the good looks are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Vetelli a perfect replacement for lost bag
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Vetelli leather bag and found it to be perfect for my needs. The leather and stitching quality are excellent and the double compartment design very useful. I don't think anyone could go wrong with this beautiful bag at an amazing price for the high quality. This bag replaced a heavily used and much loved dopp kit that was stollen from my vehicle at a motel parking lot earlier this year...the Vetelli is an excellent replacement and looks like it will hold up well in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: foggymtn

customer_reviews.title: The case came in excellent packaging, even the zipper pulls were wrapped in ...
customer_reviews.text: The case came in excellent packaging, even the zipper pulls were wrapped in paper to protect them. The leather feels wonderful and of high quality. I was surprised at how well I was able to organize my toiletries in each of the compartments. My last Dopp bag was of the same size but all one compartment. I had to dig through everything to find what I wanted. This bag is constructed in such a way that everything can be secured and easily retrieved. I can lay open the bag on the counter and everything is readily available. I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Luther

customer_reviews.title: Zippers not smooth, get stuck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my husband and after receiving it I tried all the zippers to make sure it was all good and the bottom one would barely zip. I could tell it would stop working after a few uses so I returned it and hope I can find another similar looking one on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sunita

customer_reviews.title: The toiletry bag is NOTHING like the piture on the website.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is very flimsy, it is black instead of brown, and it is NOT leather. Do not buy this travel toiletry bag. I got no response when I have emailed the seller to return this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, beautiful rich color!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, I love the waterproof lining inside. I wasn't sure what to expect, but the lining was clear, which I like. Haven't used it yet, so I can't comment on the longevity, but there's a good amount of room, and I loved the squeeze bottles that fit so nicely in the bottom. Oh, and the bag it came in is perfect to hold a pair of slippers or sandals. Overall I'm very happy with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: My husband travels for work and this was a perfect addition to his ensemble. He loves the color and the quality of the leather. The bag holds all of his toiletries secure. He also loves the pocket on the bottom of the bag that holds shampoo and other liquids. The color on the photos of the bag match the color of the bag we received.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Acker

customer_reviews.title: Super bummed it isn't real leather
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: This bag is not actually leather. It is "high grade polyurethane". You have to read the product description very closely to catch that. Super bummed it isn't real leather. Bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday and would return it if I had more time. It does seem very sturdy and it's much roomier than I expected! The zippers are great quality, more heavy duty than I was expecting. Overall a nice toiletries bag and it comes with two little shampoo bottles. Wouldn't recommend if you're looking for top quality and leather, but still a nice bag over all.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the size. I thought it would be bigger. It’s a Christmas present so I will have to wait to see if it will hold all of the things it was meant to hold. The quality of it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Ball "Nina"

customer_reviews.title: Superb, nicely designed bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a birthday gift for my son, and he loves it. It was packaged exceptionally well and is a perfect, functional, attractive bag. I recommend it highly and would not hesitate to purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Simek

customer_reviews.title: high quality and perfect size for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great quality build - soft leather, rugged zipper design that doesn't feel cheap and glides smoothly. The clear inner liner in the top compartment makes for easy cleanup, if needed and the bottom compartment comes with travel size containers for shampoo and other liquids you made need - the stretch netting pockets help keep them in place, too. I have zero complaints on the size and quality of this bag and would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R. Darden

customer_reviews.title: Good value on good product
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and great customer service with helpful tips through emails to check up on how well their product meets my needs. Lots of space in the main compartment holds all I need. The lower compartment comes with two plastic bottles that can be filled with liquids I need like shampoo and soap and lotion and conditioner; they help me conserve so I can fill the TSA friendly sized bottles from larger containers. Good value for my money.
customer_reviews.author: clement

customer_reviews.title: Super Awsome
customer_reviews.text: So this hold this everything i need for travel from tooth brush to my shaving kit and comes with 2 free travel bottles. I had a shampoo mishap while travelling but the damage was contained only to the compartment and everything along it clothees were fine . no leakage great product
customer_reviews.author: Selnaya

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected! Read on, good people!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not at all what I expected! For the price, I did not have extremely high hopes for this bag. I was sorely mistaken!! The bag is a beautiful color, the picture does NO justice to it. It's a lot roomier than it looks, also. The stitching is great and the zippers all work flawlessly. I bought this just to take on a cruise in December, but I'm using it just so I can have it out on my counter every day. Excellent work, Vetelli, I will definitely buy from you again!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia F.

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I travel too much, spending sometimes months living out of bags. This is just the right size, and well organized. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: David Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice leather bag!
customer_reviews.text: This toiletry bag is every bit as nice as it looks. The one I rceived is slightly different than the one I ordered ( it has two squeeze type bottles instead if three bottles with kids and does not have a toothbrush holder) but after some consideration I decided it works better or as well for my husband so I won't go through the hassle of returning it. The leather is so nice and the delivery was right on time. It will be perfect for his many travels.
customer_reviews.author: Suz in Wenatchee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality bag. I too saw the words leather bag and assumed it was real leather. It is cheap plastic and is not worth paying over ten dollars for. Returning for a refund and going to continue my search for an actual leather bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but bag wont zip correctly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my fiance for our honeymoon. The bag itself was really nice quality and larger than expected. However, the shipper flattened the bag to fit in a small shipping envelope/bubble mailer, which caused the zipper around the bottom to be messed up and bent oddly. The bag would not stand or zip correctly due to it being squished. If they had left it stuffed during shipping, we wouldn't be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing about this bag that I did not like! It is the perfect travel bag (for me). The leather is resilient and attractive, the size is perfect for general travel, the two compartments are greatly superior to single compartment bags and the zipper works smoothly and easily. Best bag I have had in 76 years.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to get him a nice bag that would last forever
customer_reviews.text: My son travels back and forth from my house to his dad's. He's reached the age that he wants to pack personal items to take back and forth (can't be running out of deodorant at dad's!). I wanted to get him a nice bag that would last forever. When my husband saw that I was buying our son this one for Christmas, he asked for one, too! They are both quite happy with this bag - quality, look, purpose. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he absolutely loves it. It’s great quality and very stylish. It’s water proof inside and has a lot of storage- even a hidden storage underneath with a zipper. Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a nice toiletry bag
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Howe

customer_reviews.title: ... husband for an upcoming trip and it is so beautiful. Good quality and I think I'll just use ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for an upcoming trip and it is so beautiful. Good quality and I think I'll just use it for BOTH our travel bag. zippers are smooth and sown beautifully. All our toiletry items fit. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mrs.g

customer_reviews.title: Most Excellent Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toiletry bag I have come across. To start, the detail to the packaging was unbelievable with the leather completely protected and the brass zipper pulls individually wrapped to avoid scratches. The leather is soft, supple but hold its shape well to provide excellent functionality. The bottom compartment is great, large enough for those extras that aren't quite essentials. The main compartment is a good size and will easily hold the essentials. Great bag!
customer_reviews.author: John Menard

customer_reviews.title: Finally - a bag my husband will use!
customer_reviews.text: Bag was lovely. It was shipped in a packing envelope rather than a box so it was squashed and out of shape when it got here. Otherwise, it was a beautiful piece and just what I had been searching for (and I was able to unsquish it). I loved that the bottom opened out fully flat and could hold a variety of bottles (+ the two included). Perfect gift for my husband who has insisted on travelling with his stuff crammed into a plastic bag for years!
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: really nice. I got it as a gift for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really, really nice. I got it as a gift for my son and he liked it. There were not any bottles as the description suggested, but it did not take away from this well made bag. UPDATE: The seller contacted me and sent the bottles out immediately. Exceptional customer service! Too bad I cannot put ten stars!
customer_reviews.author: Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Previous toiletry bag fell apart in only a few years. After an extensive search, found this bag. SUPER high quality with great features and accessories. Well worth the money. 110% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Horse

customer_reviews.title: Like a boss, travel in style
customer_reviews.text: Love this little dopp bag. Well maybe not so little, it is on the larger side than I really wanted but the quality is excellent. Should last a long time. The little bottles have suction cups which is a super nice touch. I use them to just suction cup them to the shower wall when traveling. I would buy more of them if I could ever find them.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Smells like and looks like real leather very cute
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday present for my dad he loves it. It's actually a lot bigger than I expected however my dad likes it so I'm satisfied with the purchase also got the product on time so five stars
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag! Very well made and great quality for the price. Did not receive any bottles in the bag as stated though. Would definitely buy all of their products again. I did buy the psssport wallet and men's grooming nail set. All great and my husband loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn king

customer_reviews.title: Great as a toiletry kit / man purse
customer_reviews.text: Nice faux leather material. Quite roomy and came with 2 dispensers. Zippers seem sturdy and handle seems to be able to hold it even when fully packed. Color is a lot more drab than what it looks like in promotional pictures, though.
customer_reviews.author: this_is_qhm

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Gentleman’s Dopp Bag
customer_reviews.text: This Dopp bag arrived just as advertised. Fit and finish are of good quality with all the right compartments to pack the essentials with the perfect separation. The included spill proof bottles are a nice addition to eliminate the need to pack larger toiletry bottles. And a great size that will pack easily into your travel bag. Good quality, style and price for the discerning gentleman.
customer_reviews.author: A P.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Roomy bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and the recipient was tickled pink with the size and the quality of the bag. He assumed it was VERY expensive. I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because I received it later than promised, which caused some timing issues!
customer_reviews.author: E. Charron

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: A perfect toiletry bag. Holds everything I need and with separate compartments, it is easy to stay organized. I also appreciate the top portion with the clear lining. Easy to clean. The leather is of good quality and I can see this lasting for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for over a year and a half and it's holding up great! The leather looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted and packaged
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how much I was paying for this item and did not expect too much but I was pleasantly surprised at first of all the quality product it is but also for the advice I have received from the seller on how to take care of it. Beautifully crafted and packaged, I would say the best toilet bag I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Buga

customer_reviews.title: Great anniversary gift
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are smooth, which was important to my husband. It's definitely a high quality bag that will last a long time. We are both very impressed and excited for this purchase. It was an anniversary gift and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Calder

customer_reviews.title: Finally, I'm a professional traveler
customer_reviews.text: This baby is awesome. Gotta have a dopp kit for all my beard grooming and shaving equipment. The liner is nice and thick, and keeps liquids safe inside.
customer_reviews.author: The Mighty Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Christmas super gift for a young man 🔯
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for my Grandson. Doing Christmas shopping. When I saw the bag I thought wow what a perfect gift for him. Read the reviews and ordered plan to fill it with some necessary items shaver shampoo Can't wait until Christmas!!!!!!! Nana
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Great function and looks
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with it. It holds more than I thought it would, especially the bottom section. The handle is easy to carry and it looks very stylish. I especially like the top area has a film to protect against leaks so it's easy to clean if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Nice Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven't had the chance yet to actually use the bag, I can see that it is well-made, attractive, and has plenty of room inside. I like the split compartment and the two bottles that come with it. I will be using the bag on a trip in early 2017 and am very happy that I will be using this bag instead of the old one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Curt A. Siebert

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Very masculine and well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. The right balance of masculine and elegant. It has a plastic lining inside which is great as a liquid protector for the bag. The bottom part has lots of little compartments which my boyfriend likes for storing extra items like his double-edged razors. It also comes with a couple liquid travel containers which was an unexpected bonus. Love the bag overall!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa O.

customer_reviews.title: I feel classier now
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with it. The bottom compartment is especially great to keep my grooming items separate.
customer_reviews.author: Trista | FindingOurNextAdventure

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and well thought out.
customer_reviews.text: The extra pockets, holders and all around design make this a solid, excellent addition to my travel gear. It is the same size as my prior bag but holds nearly twice as much do to the design.
customer_reviews.author: Boscannon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I got this for my husband and he really like it. He has never had a bag with more than one compartment which is a plus. We couldn't find one with more than one compartment in a local store. The silicon containers are cool! And the color blends with out luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Santana

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This product is great quality, expensive looking and highly functional. There are multiple pockets so there's a ton of room. The bottom of the top pocket is lined with plastic which is great since dopp kits often get wet on the inside and thus ruined. You also can't beat the price. I checked out many other dopp kits of this quality and all were much more expensive. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a roomy bag! I can actually fit everything I could possibly need for a trip of virtually any duration. Only had it a week, three trips, seems to be very sturdy. Nice zippers, good storage for bottles. Extremely nice bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: The prefect traveling toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lovely toiletry bag for my husband who will be traveling. I specifically ordered this bag due to it having separate compartments. It is of very nice quality with a professional style. We both love it. I would have no issues recommending this bag. I've been considering Vetelli's other stylish bags.
customer_reviews.author: C Moses

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Kind of stiff but it’s a nice bag. I like the pocket on the bottom. I keep my shaving clippers and hair clippers in it. Works perfect for that
customer_reviews.author: EY

customer_reviews.title: what a product!
customer_reviews.text: the quality of this bag is phenomenal! it has compartments galore, and is shipped very quickly, and securely. I would recommend this product to anyone needing a toiletry bag of excellent quality. Thank-you, Mr. Vetelli! Oh, I almost forgot. It also comes with 2 storage tubes!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son in law for Christmas. Was very nice but a little smaller than I thought I was getting. He was pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Christian

customer_reviews.title: I was convince he would love it. And he does
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toiletry bag for my boyfriend since his was from his daughter a long long time ago. When I saw this one, I was convince he would love it. And he does! We travel often, so it sure gets used. The design of the bag is terrific. Easy to organize! Thank you.... Smiles, Josephine
customer_reviews.author: J. Kwei, MD

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It is very well made and the design is great. I only wish the bottom compartment was a small bit deeper, but that's because of the items I take with me. I would quickly recommend to anyone to buy this bag. It will wear and last.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hammond

customer_reviews.title: It's NOT leather.
customer_reviews.text: You gotta read the small print. PU leather is what? Plastic? If it's too good to be true...
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and top notch, professional seller.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered just in the product description and photos to replace an existing toiletry bag. It is even nicer in person. It is quality and roomy for good organization of your things as you travel. The sellers are terrific and have great customer service! Highly recommend this seller and product!
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Well built and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift, and I love it! My wife always made fun of me for using an old mesh gym bag to cram all my toiletries into. The bag is super nice, well built, and roomy enough for my razor, deo, cologne, medicine, etc. I love the little included soap/shampoo containers too.
customer_reviews.author: AdamMB91

customer_reviews.title: Best dopp kit I've had
customer_reviews.text: I may never have to buy another dopp kit. This bag is rugged and holds everything I need for travel. The "bonus bottles" for shampoo and conditioner are also handy if you prefer to take your own, rather than use what hotels provide...or, if none is available.
customer_reviews.author: Chace

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a well constructed bag. It looks very stylish and I have already gotten compliments about it. It holds all of the products that I need to take with me when I travel with room to spare. The two different compartments come in handy in organizing everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lifer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Slightly larger than most other Dopp Kits. Perfect for what I need. Excellent quality. This would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: JoeC

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!  Bought Another!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for our son. My husband was so impressed I ordered one for him! Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: SusanF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect man's toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this leather toiletry bag for my 30 year old son who travels all the time for business. He LOVES it. He said it is one of the best gifts ever. I was impressed with it as well. It's a very good quality and the perfect size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Raise the Roof

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, but weird smell
customer_reviews.text: It smelled really strange when it was delivered. I had to wash it before gifting it to my dad. He was happy with the present.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I took my husbands old toiletry bag but replaced it with this one. Needless to say he was happy with the trade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant but masculine
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for fiancé who was still using plastic zip locks bags for toiletries. I thought it was time for a grown-up toiletries bag. Beautiful bag, beautiful leather. I liked that the bottom zippered compartment was lined in plastic to protect from spills and that it also came with its own reusable travel size liquid containers that fit perfectly into pouch. I wish they made a woman's version or jewelry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Linden

product_meta.title: Vetelli Leather Toiletry Bag For Men. Our Dopp Kit Comes With 2 Silicone Travel Bottles And Is A Perfect Gift And Travel Accessory
feature_bullets: Vetelli's mens Toiletry Bag is the PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION - keep your personal care products in one place for easy travel. Our Classic Dop Kit design leaves plenty of interior room for storing larger items like shampoo, cologne, and deodorant and also allows you room to organize smaller items like scissors, clippers, razors and more.

Includes a STYLISH WATERPROOF LINING that will protect your other items from leaks and spills while traveling. Exterior leather (high grade PU) combines with a nylon inner lining and a water resistant inner bottom to give fantastic protection and we finish with Steel YKK zips for a long-lasting reliable mens grooming bag

TWO LARGE COMPARTMENTS - Features 2 separate large zipped storage compartments that easily fit a range of travel & shave accessories. Also features 2x inner zipped pockets & 2x travel bottle mesh pouches. Our men's wash bag comes with two 2oz (60ml) silicon travel bottles making it the ultimate mens travel toiletry bag, travel kit and organizer.

LOOKING FOR THAT PERFECT GIFT for Dad on his  Birthday Anniversary, Wedding Fathers Day Valentines Day or Christmas? Surprise your husband, brother, father or fiancee with a Classic Vetelli toiletry bag.
All Vetellis Travel Accessories For Men including our Toiletry Bags and Dopp Kits are backed by our 100% customer satisfaction promise.
